ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would highly recommend this course to students who are interested in the theoretical aspects of analysis on nature, technology, commodities and markets.

I wouldn't recommend taking it. While the subjects are interesting, they are only novel to people that have never taken an anthropology course. The format of the course doesn't compensate for any redundancy in material.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This material covered in this course is highly related to my own dissertation research, and has very positively influenced the direction of my research questions. I plan to continue interacting with this particular body of anthropological literature for the rest of career at Yale and beyond.
